description: Try our easy to follow Japanese Loaded Gems recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Finger food,Tree nut free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Japanese Loaded Gems Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt 900g frozen birds eye potato gems

recipeInstructions.text: Cook frozen Birds Eye Potato Gems following packet directions.
Place gems in a serving bowl and thinly drizzle with both the kewpie and tonkatsu sauces.
Sprinkle, furikake and crushed nori, Garnish with fresh herbs for serving.
